Messages

Class Message<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • Messages.Message<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - 

    public class Message<T>
extends java.lang.Object
    A generic class with a type parameter called M Enables stronger type checks and no casting needed The T is a standard naming convention meaning type

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Message(MessageType type, java.lang.String from, java.lang.String to, T messageObject)
      Constructor - creates a new instance of a message Date and Time are set to the current time of that location
